item.title: About
item.description: Xiangyi MENG Phd Student Department of Computer Science City University of Hong Kong Email: xy.meng [at] my.cityu.edu.hk About Me I am currently a first-year PhD student in the Department of Computer Science at City University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Cong Wang. I got my B.E. degree of computer science at Xiamen University at 2018. Research Interests Security in Deep Learning, Cyber Security, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Bioinformatics, etc.
